metadata.title: USN-5563-1 -- http-parser vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that http-parser incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass security controls or gain unauthorized access to sensitive data.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5563-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libhttp-parser2.7.1 - 2.7.1-2ubuntu0.1 libhttp-parser-dev - 2.7.1-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
